inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Known diagnosis of COPD (GOLD stage 2 or higher)

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: Daughter reports med compliance and compliance with BiPap at night

exclusion.criterion: Estimated GFR <30 ml/min/1.73 m2 or on hemodialysis
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Women known to be pregnant or planning to be pregnant in next 6 months
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Cardiac pacemaker, metallic heart valves, metallic implants, claustrophobic
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Chronic atrial fibrillation or frequent premature ventricular contractions
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: No mention of chronic atrial fibrillation or frequent premature ventricular contractions

exclusion.criterion: Using lipid-lowering medications, aspirin, oral steroids, steroid-sparing medications or anti-oxidant vitamin supplements
exclusion.label: unknown
not_met
exclusion.evidence: No mention of acute myocardial infarction within 48 hours, unstable angina not yet stabilized with medical therapy, ongoing chest pain, active broncho-constriction, uncontrolled cardiac arrhythmia, symptomatic severe aortic stenosis, aortic dissection, acute pulmonary embolism or pericarditis

exclusion.criterion: Uncontrolled COPD or acute COPD exacerbation
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: No mention of uncontrolled COPD or acute COPD exacerbation

exclusion.criterion: Known chronic inflammatory diseases like lupus or active infection
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of CAD, CHF, obesity hypoventilation syndrome, obstructive sleep apnea, DM2, ventricular tachycardia, hypothyroidism, schizophrenia, and COPD. She is currently using BiPap at night.
